dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5452 IH: Child Support Assistance Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy (for himself and Mr. Murphy of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to clarify the ability to use consumer reports in certain cases to establish and enforce child support payments.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Child Support Assistance Act of 2014.

section.header: Use of consumer reports by State or local child support enforcement agencies
section.text: Section 604(a) of the Fair Credit Reporting Act (15 U.S.C. 1681b(a)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking or determining the appropriate level of such payments and inserting , determining the appropriate level of such payments, or enforcing a child support order, award, agreement, or judgment;
in subparagraph (B), by adding and at the end;
